characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: SPACE WOLVES units within 6" of any friendly SPACE WOLVES ANCIENTS add 1 to their Leadership. In addition, roll a D6 each time a <CHAPTER> INFANTRY model is destroyed within 6" of any friendly  SPACE WOLVES ANCIENTS, before removing the model as a casualty. On a 4+, that model musters one last surge of strength before succumbing to its wounds; it can either shoot with one of its weapons as if it were the Shooting phase, or make a single attack as if it were the Fight phase.
